IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: AMERICAN TRAINING, INC. PROVIDES HOUSING, EMPLOYABILITY DEVELOPMENT, RELEVANT PERSONAL AND VOCATIONAL COUNSELING, VOCATIONAL SKILLS DEVELOPMENT AND TRAINING AND OTHER RELATED SERVICES AND SUPPORT TO THE DEVELOPMENTALLY DISABLED, MENTALLY ILL, PHYSICALLY HANDICAPPED AND ECONOMICALLY DISADVANTAGED INDIVIDUALS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: AMERICAN TRAINING, INC. PROVIDES HOUSING, EMPLOYABILITY DEVELOPMENT, RELEVANT PERSONAL AND VOCATIONAL COUNSELING, VOCATIONAL SKILLS DEVELOPMENT AND TRAINING AND OTHER RELATED SERVICES AND SUPPORT TO THE DEVELOPMENTALLY DISABLED, MENTALLY ILL, PHYSICALLY HANDICAPPED AND ECONOMICALLY DISADVANTAGED INDIVIDUALS.
IRS990.Desc: RESIDENTIAL PROGRAMS DEVELOP SERVICES TO SUPPORT LIVING SITUATIONS TO EMPOWER RESIDENTS TO BE SELF-SUFFICIENT AND TO ENRICH THE QUALITY OF THEIR LIVES. SUPPORTS ARE PROVIDED IN WAYS THAT CREATE SUCCESSFUL COMMUNITY LIVING AND SEEK OPPORTUNITIES THAT PROMOTE COMMUNITY AWARENESS , ACCEPTANCE, AND INVOLVEMENT FOR THE RESIDENTS SERVICED. THESE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED TO ADULTS WITH DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES AND TO ADOLESCENTS WITH PSYCHIATRIC DISABILITIES. IN FY 2022 149 INDIVIDUALS WERE SERVED.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: DAY PROGRAMS PROVIDE INDIVIDUALS WITH VOCATIONAL AND SUPPORTED EMPLOYMENT SERVICES, BOTH COMMUNITY BASED AND IN A WORK SETTING. THE PROGRAM PROVIDES JOB PLACEMENT , JOB SITE TRAINING AND ON-GOING MONITORING AND FOLLOW-UP. INTEGRATED WORK CREWS , EMPLOYER BASED JOB SITES, VOLUNTEER OPPORTUNITIES AND INDIVIDUAL PLACEMENT ARE SOUGHT AND ORGANIZED TO EXPOSE INDIVIDUALS TO A VARIETY OF EMPLOYMENT CHOICES AND SKILLS. IT PROVIDES INTEGRATION OF INDIVIDUALS WITHIN THEIR COMMUNITIES TO ATTAIN MEANINGFUL COMMUNITY CONNECTIONS. PROVIDES DAY HABILITATION PROGRAMS WHICH FOCUS ON DEVELOPMENTAL SKILLS SUCH AS PT,OT,NURSING & ASSISTIVE TECHNOLOGY. IN FY 2022 550 INDIVIDUALS WERE SERVED.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: VANWAY TRANSPORTS INDIVIDUALS WITH DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES TO AND FROM THEIR HOMES AND DAY PROGRAMS. VANWAY TRANSPORTS INDIVIDUALS ON 11 ROUTES FUNDED THROUGH A REGIONAL TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY. IN FY 2022, VANWAY TRANSPORTED 51 INDIVIDUALS THROUGHOUT THE NORTHEAST AREA OF MASSACHUSETTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: EDUCATION & WORK READINESS SERVICES ADULTS AND AT RISK YOUTH. SERVICES INCLUDE LITERACY PROGRAMS, ESL & BASIC ED AND YOUNG PARENTS PROGRAM.
EMPLOYMENT PROGRAM-IN FY 2022 89 INDIVIDUALS WERE PAID AN HOURLY RATE FOR WORK OPPORTUNITIES.

STUDENT TRAINING & SUPPORT SERVICES ECONOMICALLY DISADVANTAGED ADULTS. COURSES OFFERED INCLUDE ELECTRONIC ASSEMBLY, OFFICE/COMPUTER, MEDICAL ASSISTING, MEDICAL BILLING-CODING, GED PREP AND ESL PREP. VOCATIONAL COUNSELING AND JOB PLACEMENT COMPLEMENT THESE PROGRAMS FOR WIA/DTA PARTICIPANTS AS WELL AS DISLOCATED WORKERS. IN FY 2022 215 STUDENTS WERE SERVED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION ACCOUNTS FOR THE EFFECT OF ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS BASED ON A "MORE LIKELY THAN NOT" THRESHOLD TO THE RECOGNITION OF THE TAX POSITIONS BEING SUSTAINED BASED ON THE TECHNICAL MERITS OF THE POSITION UNDER SCRUTINY BY THE APPLICABLE TAXING AUTHORITY. IF A TAX POSITION OR POSITIONS ARE DEEMED TO RESULT IN UNCERTAINTIES OF THOSE POSITIONS, THE UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFIT IS ESTIMATED BASED ON A "CUMULATIVE PROBABILITY ASSESSMENT" THAT AGGREGATES THE ESTIMATED TAX LIABILITY FOR ALL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. INTEREST AND PENALTIES ASSESSED, IF ANY, ARE ACCRUED AS INCOME TAX EXPENSE. THE ORGANIZATION HAS IDENTIFIED ITS TAX STATUS AS A TAX-EXEMPT ENTITY AND ITS DETERMINATION AS TO ITS INCOME BEING RELATED OR UNRELATED AS ITS ONLY SIGNIFICANT TAX POSITIONS. HOWEVER, THE ORGANIZATION HAS DETERMINED THAT SUCH TAX POSITIONS DO NOT RESULT IN AN UNCERTAINTY REQUIRING RECOGNITION. THE ORGANIZATION IS NOT CURRENTLY UNDER EXAMINATION BY ANY TAXING JURISDICTION. THE ORGANIZATION'S FEDERAL AND STATE TAX RETURNS ARE GENERALLY OPEN FOR EXAMINATION FOR THREE YEARS FOLLOWING THE DATE FILED.

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: PURCHASE OF REAL ESTATE, REFINANCING OF DEBT, AND CAPITAL IMPROVEMENTS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ISSUER NAME: MA DEVELOPMENT FINANCE AGENCY DATE THE REBATE COMPUTATION WAS PERFORMED: 12/23/2021

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: INFORMATION FOR THE FORM 990 IS COLLECTED BY OUR FINANCE STAFF AND SENT TO AN OUTSIDE TAX FIRM TO PREPARE. A DRAFT IS REVIEWED BY THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER AND CORRECTIONS MADE, IF ANY, BY THE TAX FIRM. A FINAL VERSION IS MAILED TO ALL BOARD MEMBERS PRIOR TO ITS FILING WITH THE IRS. CLARIFICATION AND/OR CORRECTIONS WILL BE MADE, IF APPROPRIATE, AFTER DISCUSSION WITH THE CFO AND TAX FIRM. THE FINAL DOCUMENT, AS FILED, WILL ALSO BE PRESENTED AT THE NEXT BOARD MEETING BY THE CFO.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY COVERS ALL CLASSES OF PERSONNEL WITHIN THE COMPANY, INCLUDING DIRECT CARE, MANAGEMENT AND BOARD POSITIONS. BOARD MEMBERS RECEIVE A RELATED PARTY QUESTIONNAIRE ANNUALLY WHICH DEFINES CONFLICTS OF INTEREST. DIRECT CARE AND MANAGEMENT RECEIVE AND SIGN FOR A POLICY AND PROCEDURE MANUAL WHICH INCLUDES THIS POLICY. POTENTIAL CONFLICTS ARE REVIEWED BY THE CORPORATE COMPLIANCE OFFICER. IF A CONFLICT IS FOUND TO EXIST, THE CORPORATE COMPLIANCE OFFICER ALONG WITH THE PRESIDENT AND EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR WILL DETERMINE WHAT RESTRICTIONS WILL BE IMPOSED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION FOR THE ORGANIZATION'S TOP MANAGEMENT AND OTHER OFFICERS OF THE ORGANIZATION INCLUDES A REVIEW BY INDEPENDENT PERSONS. COMPENSATION IS SET USING COMPARABILITY DATA FROM SIMILAR ORGANIZATIONS. DOCUMENTATION OF THE DELIBERATIONS AND DECISIONS OCCUR CONTEMPORANEOUSLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S FORM 990 IS AVAILABLE ON WWW.GUIDESTAR.COM. THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE MASSACHUSETTS ATTORNEY GENERAL'S WEBSITE. THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE AVAILABLE UPON WRITTEN REQUEST.
